span.span: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对方法进行调用以销毁线程时, 公共语言运行时将引发。When a call is made to the method to destroy a thread, the common language runtime throws a . 是一个可以被捕获的特殊异常, 但会在`catch`块的末尾再次自动引发。 is a special exception that can be caught, but it will automatically be raised again at the end of the `catch` block. 引发此异常时, 运行时会在结束线程之前`finally`执行所有块。When this exception is raised, the runtime executes all the `finally` blocks before ending the thread. 因为线程可以在`finally`块中执行未绑定的计算或调用以取消中止, 所以不能保证线程永远就会结束。Because the thread can do an unbounded computation in the `finally` blocks or call to cancel the abort, there is no guarantee that the thread will ever end. 如果要等到中止的线程结束, 则可以调用方法。If you want to wait until the aborted thread has ended, you can call the method. 在线程实际停止执行之前, 不会返回阻止调用。 is a blocking call that does not return until the thread actually stops executing. **仅限 .NET Core：** 尽管 .net Core 中存在此类型, 但由于不支持, 公共语言运行时将不会引发。**.NET Core only:** Even though this type exists in .NET Core, since is not supported, the common language runtime won't ever throw . > [!NOTE] > 当公共语言运行时 (CLR) 在托管的可执行文件中的所有前台线程结束后停止后台线程时, 它不会使用。When the common language runtime (CLR) stops background threads after all foreground threads in a managed executable have ended, it does not use . 因此, 您不能使用来检测由 CLR 终止后台线程的时间。Therefore, you cannot use to detect when background threads are being terminated by the CLR. 使用 COR_E_THREADABORTED 值为0x80131530 的 HRESULT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED, which has the value 0x80131530. > [!NOTE] > 继承属性的值始终`null`为。The value of the inherited property is always `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何中止线程。The following example demonstrates aborting a thread. 接收的`ThreadAbortException`线程使用方法取消中止请求并继续执行。The thread that receives the `ThreadAbortException` uses the method to cancel the abort request and continue executing. Main - aborting my thread. Thread - caught ThreadAbortException - resetting. Exception message: Thread was being aborted. Thread - still alive and working. Thread - finished working. Main ending. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象通过`stateInfo` 方法的参数指定。The object returned by this property is specified through the `stateInfo` parameter of the method. 此对象的确切内容和用法是已定义的应用程序;它通常用于传递对要中止的线程有意义的信息。The exact content and usage of this object is application defined; it is typically used to convey information that is meaningful to the thread being aborted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将信息传递到正在中止的线程。The following code example shows how to pass information to a thread that is being aborted.
